titleStmt.title: Clidamas, or The Sicilian tale. VVritten by I.S.
titleStmt.author: I. S., fl. 1639.
Hollar, Wenceslaus, 1607-1677, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Payne, and are to be sold by Iohn Cowper, at the Holy Lambe, at the east end of Saint Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed: W: Hollar, fecit.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Holy Lambe, at the east end of Saint Paules Church
